allow: Bash(go run -e -c 'package main; import \(""encoding/json""; ""fmt""; ""os""\); func main\(\) { d, _ := os.ReadFile\(""assets/example-records.json""\); var v interface{}; if err := json.Unmarshal\(d, &v\); err != nil { fmt.Println\(""Invalid:"", err\) } else { fmt.Println\(""Valid JSON""\) } }')
